title: Not My Type
description: Elsa struggled with her weight for as long as she could remember, yet fortune delivered the perfect man into her life. Joe was the embodiment of all women’s tall, dark, handsome, and a little kinky in the bedroom. Best of all, he liked his women curvy. Elsa could never shake the feeling she didn’t quite deserve him but counted her blessings….until a lifetime of bad habits caught up to her. When Elsa is diagnosed with Type 2 diabetes, her life as she knew it was over. Would Joe stand by her side or would her new reality tear them apart?
author: Emma Caruso
